# [Interview #128: WH Signing Report - Br00se, Entry #16](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=128#16)

#### Question

Would a hero tied to the Wheel be seen in
*Tel'aran'rhiod*
after he'd been born?

#### Robert Jordan

No.
